test.name: Processo de reserva de pacote de viagens

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Esperar o popup abrir, clicar em "Mostrar detalhes" e permitir apenas cookies essenciais
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validar as informações da "Configuração" da viagem
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'css=body > div.container > div > div.col-md-4.col-sm-4.hidden-xs > div.summary > div:nth-child(7) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div.col-xs-8.col-sm-8.col-md-8.text-right' contains text '5 Noites 1 pessoa por pacote'.

kw.name: Validar as informações do período da viagem
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'css=body > div.container > div > div.col-md-4.col-sm-4.hidden-xs > div.summary > div:nth-child(9) > div > div' contains text '01 Ago 2022'.

kw.name: Validar a informação sobre cancelamento grátis

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
